summary: An ordinance providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property and property rights in portions of Sections 3, 4 & 5, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M., including portions of First Addition to Lake Forest Park, Rose Terrace Addition, Rose Addition No. 1, Lago Vista, Fir View Terrace Second Addition, Fir View Terrace, Hemlock Acres and the Northend Country Estates, for a watermain pipe line right of way, as an addition to and extension and betterment of the existing municipal water plant and system of the City of Seattle, and providing for payment therefor.
